page.title: 01TRANSPORT
page.content: In{BRAMLEY}we have quite a lot of Transport. We have got a station with trains coming in every hour and a bus service with buses running every hour.The most popular form of transport in{BRAMLEY}is by car.In{ {STRATFIELD-SAYE}they have not got a bus service or station. In the olden days the people didn't have cars, trains, lorries or buses. The only transport they had was bikes, by foot and horse and cart but some people couldn't afford a horse and cart. After the car had been invented it was easier to travel. Most people couldn't afford a car so they had to buy a bike or a horse and cart. Nowadays we have all the transport we need, like cars, buses, trains and lorris, although some people still enjoy horse riding. M LEY {E
